price: او یاد کړه (ای پیغمبره! دې خلکو ته) په کتاب (قرآن) کې (کیسه د) ابراهیم، یقینا هغه ډیر ریښتیا ویونکی نبي و.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
